author: marvin
msg: Move remaining Perl code for the primary CFC classes into Clownfish.pm,
similar to how all remaining Lucy Perl code has been consolidated in Lucy.pm.

author: marvin
msg: Lucy's destuctors were being bound to Perl, but as "destroy" rather than
"DESTROY" -- so they were being ignored for the most part.  The sole exception
was Obj, for which a handrolled binding was working properly, and unlike the
others, called Lucy_Obj_Destroy(self) (a method call) rather than e.g.
lucy_Searcher_destroy(self) (a function call).  Since everybody else inherited
DESTROY from Obj, the behavior was correct -- but by accident, since the
intent was to go through those other destructors.
This patch eliminates the Obj hack, and binds all Lucy destructors as DESTROY.

author: felixk
msg: Set image src path in configuration correct to free image tag in a document from path additions (DIRSERVER-1678)

author: lu4242
msg: MYFACES-3414 MyFaces ResourceImpl$ValueExpressionFilterInputStream does not handle resolving long URLs [CVE-2011-4367]
